tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE insurance_policies (
    policy_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    policy_holder_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    risk_factor DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    coverage_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    premium_amount DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE premiums (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    risk_factor VARCHAR,
    coverage_type VARCHAR,
    premium_amount DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE customers (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR,
    age INT,
    address VARCHAR,
    email VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE RiskFactors (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  factor_name TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE CoverageTypes (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  type_name TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE PolicyHolders (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  policy_number TEXT,
  holder_name TEXT,
  age INT
)

CREATE TABLE Premiums (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  policy_id INT,
  coverage_type_id INT,
  risk_factor_id INT,
  premium_amount DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE Premiums (
    premium_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id UUID,
    premium_amount DECIMAL,
    risk_factor DECIMAL,
    coverage_type VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE Customers (
    customer_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_name VARCHAR,
    customer_age INT,
    customer_address VARCHAR,
    customer_email VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE RiskFactors (
    risk_factor_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    risk_factor_name VARCHAR,
    risk_factor_value DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE CoverageTypes (
    coverage_type_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    coverage_type_name VARCHAR,
    coverage_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE PremiumCalculation (
    premium_calc_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    premium_id UUID,
    risk_factor_id UUID,
    coverage_type_id UUID,
    calculation_date DATE
)
